feature_descriptions.pt_ratio_tau_lep: Ratio of tau to lepton transverse momentum
feature_descriptions.has_jets: Binary indicator for presence of jets
feature_descriptions.deltar_tau_lep_binned: Binned angular separation between tau and lepton
feature_descriptions.mass_vis_higgs_window: Visible mass in Higgs mass window (100-150 GeV)
feature_descriptions.has_valid_mmc: Binary indicator for valid MMC mass reconstruction
feature_descriptions.mmc_higgs_window: MMC mass in Higgs mass window
feature_descriptions.pt_h_over_pt_tot: Ratio of Higgs pT to total pT
feature_descriptions.large_deltaeta_jets: Large rapidity gap between jets (VBF signature)
feature_descriptions.higgs_discriminant: Combined discriminant score for Higgs identification
